content: Supporting code for the Care Connect API client sessions is available https://github.com/nhsconnect/careconnect-examples/tree/master/hapi-patient-find-example-one

Code for the DIY server session is here https://github.com/nhsconnect/careconnect-examples/tree/master/ccri-nosql-fhirStarter The coding session will use MongoDB, if you wish to follow the example please install MongoDb and configure the database beforehand.
